summary:
Worked on the redesign of the Yahoo Finance mobile-website.
The project was deployed in Nov 2013.
Designed, wireframed and implemented the interface for the STEP - a scholarly text editing platform - funded by NEH. Created instructional videos and conducted usability tests.
Created interactive surveys to analyze the uncanny valley effect for research experiments. Created a hulu-like survey to conduct a ~20 day long participatory research.
Implemented and deployed the Oracle Fusion Search. Implemented the front end of Oracle Fusion VSOE Revenue Management using ADF components. Conducted recruitment interviews.
Created and deployed J2EE 8 web services for BSNL Telecom. Managed a team of 4. Conducted recruitment interviews. Conducted training sessions and handled offsite customer support
